CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Vanguard Dynamics relative to Apex Systems?
SRP.A: Vanguard Dynamics is {above} Apex Systems in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Apex Systems relative to Starlight Innovations?
SRP.A: Apex Systems is {below} Starlight Innovations in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Apex Systems relative to Vanguard Dynamics?
SRP.A: Apex Systems is {below} Vanguard Dynamics in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total debt to equity ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Vanguard Dynamics}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total debt to equity ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Apex Systems}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starlight Innovations's minimum Debt to Equity Ratio in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starlight Innovations's minimum Debt to Equity Ratio is in {1991}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Apex Systems's maximum Debt to Equity Ratio in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Apex Systems's maximum Debt to Equity Ratio is in {1992}.

NC.Q: Was the total Debt to Equity Ratio in 1994 higher or lower than in 1995?
NC.A: The total debt to equity ratio in 1994 was {lower} than in 1995.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 2004, did the total Debt to Equity Ratio experience a larger or smaller change than between 2003 and 2010?
NC.A: The change in total debt to equity ratio between 1991 and 2004 was {larger} than between 2003 and 2010.

NC.Q: Was the total Debt to Equity Ratio in 1997 higher or lower than in 2006?
NC.A: The total debt to equity ratio in 1997 was {lower} than in 2006.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2010, was the average total Debt to Equity Ratio higher or lower than between 1996 and 2002?
NC.A: The average total debt to equity ratio between 1999 and 2010 was {higher} than between 1996 and 2002.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Vanguard Dynamics} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Vanguard Dynamics and Starlight Innovations first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Vanguard Dynamics and Starlight Innovations first exchanged leading positions in {1992}.
